title: Year-Round Plastic Reduction
description: Reduce single-use plastics throughout the year by using reusable bottles, bags, straws, and containers, making eco-friendly choices in daily life to protect the environment and wildlife.

title: Sustainable Commute Challenge
description: Commit to using eco-friendly transportation for six months by cycling, walking, carpooling, or using public transit to reduce carbon emissions and support sustainable living habits daily.

title: Home Energy Optimization
description: Optimize your home energy usage for the next 12 months by installing energy-efficient appliances, turning off unused devices, and monitoring consumption to reduce bills and environmental impact.

title: Water-Saving Marathon
description: Engage in a year-long challenge to conserve water at home and in your community by reducing waste, fixing leaks, collecting rainwater, and using water-efficient appliances consistently.
